metadata.name: Nimue
metadata.description:
Ordnance specialist.

Enjoys the colour black, rebellious and generally unpleasant to deal with, except for those she cares for. She gives everything she can to her friends and comrades.

Nimue can forsee the trajectory of a bullet or an explosive, seconds before it's launched, along with this she has devoted her time to studying ammunition and weapons in depth, making her a deadly assasin.
